overview:
Adam is Vice President of EQAL’s Owned & Operated Networks. A graduate of Boston University’s College of Communication, Adam is an accomplished entertainment and digital media executive. Adam launched and ran niche social networks for Jessica Biel (Make The Difference Network) and Bode Miller (SkiSpace). Next, Adam was New Media Content Manager for Comcast Entertainment Group (E!, Style, G4). Here, Wescott was responsible for the creation and distribution of the networks’ online video. Adam was the partner liaison to Hulu, YouTube, Verizon Wireless, iTunes and more. In addition, Adam helped create the E! Online and Live From the Red Carpet mobile apps for iPhone, iPad and Android.

As Director of Content for EQAL Media Networks, Adam launched and oversaw content for aportfolio of celebrity websites including Bethenny.com, NickCannon.com, JWOWW.com and more. Most recently, Wescott launched EQAL’s YouTube original partner channel, u look haute; developing and executive producing all original series including the network’s flagship competition series, Beauty Vlogger Boot Camp with Elle and Blair Fowler.
